error.message: Cannot deserialize the current JSON object (e.g. {"name":"value"}) into type 'BeYourMarket.Web.Areas.Admin.Controllers.ListingController+CategoryJson[]' because the type requires a JSON array (e.g. [1,2,3]) to deserialize correctly. To fix this error either change the JSON to a JSON array (e.g. [1,2,3]) or change the deserialized type so that it is a normal .NET type (e.g. not a primitive type like integer, not a collection type like an array or List<T>) that can be deserialized from a JSON object. JsonObjectAttribute can also be added to the type to force it to deserialize from a JSON object. Path 'length', line 1, position 10.
